title: Heart Piece
description: Can be exchanged 5 at a time with the goddess statues around Hyrule for more health.
location: Can be found in chests around Hyrule.

title: Divine Vessel
description: A vessel strong enough to contain a portion of Hylia's Light, allowing the Lost One (you) to journey off Hope's Rise. While not consumable itself, this item produces your Estus Flasks from Hylia's Light when resting at a campfire.
location: Can be recieved from the Old Man after completing the 4 shrines on Hope's Rise.

title: Estus Flask
description:
After recieving the Divine vessel you will recieve 5 of these whenever you rest at a campfire. Use these to restore your health and stamina! (Amount scales with Vitality and Endurance respectively)
Use with Dpad-down ↡ + Activate⇓
location: Can be refilled by resting at a campfire after recivieving it from the Old Man.

title: Goron Powder Keg
description: Portable exploding barrels! Drop them from your inventory to pick them up to place or throw them. Can be exploded with the Slingshot.
location: Can be found in chests around Hyrule.

title: Deployable Paraglider
description: A temporary paraglider that can be dropped from your inventory, when you drop it from your inventory you can pick them up and can jump off a cliff and glide. Good for a few flights, but they break easily so be careful.
location: Can be found in chests around Hyrule.

title: Metal Balloon
description: These balloons act like Octo Balloons, but these don't pop! Make your flying dreams come true.
location: Can be found in chests around Hyrule.

title: Cracked Pyro Pot
description: This pot has been filled with the magics home to Death Mountain; namely fire.
location: Can be crafted at the alchemy tables found in towns and the Shrine of Resurrection. Needs: 1 Pot, 1 Red Chuchu Jelly, 1 Ruby, and 100 Rupees.

title: Cracked Hydro Pot
description: The Zora use these pots to stay hydrated. Particularly useful on Death Mountain.
location: Can be crafted at the alchemy tables found in towns and the Shrine of Resurrection. Needs: 1 Pot, 1 Blue Chuchu Jelly, 1 Opal, and 100 Rupees.

title: Cracked Cryo Pot
description: The dragon Naydra's breath has blessed the water in this jar. Treasured in Gerudo.
location: Can be crafted at the alchemy tables found in towns and the Shrine of Resurrection. Needs: 1 Pot, 1 White Chuchu Jelly, 1 Sapphire, and 100 Rupees.

title: Cracked Dendro Pot
description: This isn't exactly a pot, but rather, a magical seed. Creats a wall of thorns.
location: Can be crafted at the alchemy tables found in towns and the Shrine of Resurrection.

title: Cracked Aero Pot
description: This pot houses the gusts of Tabantha Plains. Break to release several updrafts.
location: Can be crafted at the alchemy tables found in towns and the Shrine of Resurrection. Needs: 1 Pot, 1 Blue Chuchu Jelly, 1 Opal, and 100 Rupees.

title: Cracked Electro Pot
description: This pot contains the fury of Faron's ever-lasting storm. It has a delayed effect.
location: Can be crafted at the alchemy tables found in towns and the Shrine of Resurrection. Needs: 1 Pot, 1 Yellow Chuchu Jelly, 1 Topaz, and 100 Rupees.

title: Cracked Magno Pot
description: This metalic pot was made by an expert craftsman. Breaking it seems a shame. (WARNING: This will send giant metal spiked balls flying in all directions. Be careful.)
location: Can be crafted at the alchemy tables found in towns and the Shrine of Resurrection. Needs: 1 Pot, 1 Blue Chuchu Jelly, 1 Diamond, and 100 Rupees.

title: Cracked Geo Pot
description: A cracked pot filled with the power of Geo. (WARNING: This will send giant stone boulders flying in all directions. Be careful.)
location: Can be crafted at the alchemy tables found in towns and the Shrine of Resurrection.

title: Cracked Deo Pot
description: This strange pot seems to house the power of Hylia. Has a 25% chance to duplicate.
location: Can be crafted at the alchemy tables found in towns and the Shrine of Resurrection. Needs: 1 Pot, 1 Blue Chuchu Jelly, 1 Star Fragment, and 250 Rupees.

title: Cracked Entro Pot
description: A cracked pot imbued with the power of Entro
location: Can be crafted at the alchemy tables found in towns and the Shrine of Resurrection. Needs: 1 Pot, 1 Blue Chuchu Jelly, 25 Fairy, and 1,000 Rupees.
